languages.text: "Путь Избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора делает странные извивы... но пока твое сердце преисполнено веры, я приветствую тебя в наших рядах".
"The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."
languages.original_text: "Путь Избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора делает странные извивы... но пока твое сердце преисполнено веры, я приветствую тебя в наших рядах".

traits.locale_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

languages.text: “帝皇选民的道路真是充满了古怪的曲折……但只要你心怀信仰，我就愿意欢迎你加入我们的行列。”
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇选民的道路真是充满了古怪的曲折……但只要你心怀信仰，我就愿意欢迎你加入我们的行列。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La voie empruntée par l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur est des plus sinueuses... mais tant que vous aurez la foi, vous serez la bienvenue parmi nous. »
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

traits.locale_text: « La voie empruntée par l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur est des plus sinueuses... mais tant que vous aurez la foi, vous serez la bienvenue parmi nous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El camino de los elegidos del Emperador toma muchos giros y cambios inesperados... pero mientras tu corazón esté lleno de fe, eres bienvenida entre nosotros».
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

traits.locale_text: «El camino de los elegidos del Emperador toma muchos giros y cambios inesperados... pero mientras tu corazón esté lleno de fe, eres bienvenida entre nosotros».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「皇帝がお選びになる道は奇妙にも曲がりくねっている…だが、あなたの心が信仰で満ちている限り、同じ地位に就くことを歓迎しよう」
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝がお選びになる道は奇妙にも曲がりくねっている…だが、あなたの心が信仰で満ちている限り、同じ地位に就くことを歓迎しよう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Pfad der Auserwählten des Imperators ist oft verschlungen ... Doch so lange Euer Herz voller Glauben ist, heiße ich Euch in unseren Reihen willkommen."
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

traits.locale_text: "Der Pfad der Auserwählten des Imperators ist oft verschlungen ... Doch so lange Euer Herz voller Glauben ist, heiße ich Euch in unseren Reihen willkommen."

languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."

languages.text: "İmparator'un seçilmişlerinin yolu, garip dönemeçlerden geçer... Yüreğin inançla dolu olduğu sürece safımızda sana yer olacak."
languages.original_text: "The path of the Emperor's chosen takes strange twists and turns... but as long as your heart is filled with faith, I welcome you to our ranks."
